sentences.en: Most of these students come from well-educated, white-collar families.
sentences.cn: 这些学生大多来自受过良好教育的白领家庭。

sentences.en: Many of the immigrants are well-educated.
sentences.cn: 许多移民受过良好的教育。

sentences.en: We need to redesign the school system so that it produces a well-educated population.
sentences.cn: 我们需要重新设计教育体系，使之培育出拥有良好教育的一代人。
